H3.text: what currency to take to turkey 2010. Turkish lira

A4.text: The lira (Turkish: Türk lirası; sign: ₺; ISO 4217 code: TRY; abbreviation: TL) is the official currency of Turkey.

A5.text: The second Turkish lira was introduced on 1 January 2005... In the transition period between January 2005 and December 2008, the second Turkish lira was officially called Yeni Türk lirası... From 1 January 2009, the prefix 'new' was removed from the second Turkish lira, its official name in Turkey becoming 'Turkish lira' again.
